title: 122: Plato VIII: Aaron, Timmy, Ollie, Dmitri, and Tyrone
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: In book eight of Plato's Republic, Socrates discusses the degradation of an Aristocracy into more mediocre forms of government. Spoiler, democracy is not near the top.
itunes:author: Two Tyrones and a Timmy
itunes:subtitle: Five Guys doing government instead of burgers.
itunes:summary: In book eight of Plato's Republic, Socrates discusses the degradation of an Aristocracy into more mediocre forms of government. Spoiler, democracy is not near the top.
